General.Name: Carzo Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Carzo Holdings Berhad imports, distributes, and wholesales fruits. The company offers ready-to-eat fruits, fruit juices, and dried fruits, as well as plant based drinks, pickled fruits, cut fruits, and frozen fruits. It also provides frozen meat and seafood, nuts, and vegetables; ready-to-eat food, such as soup, canned food, and pre-mix sauces and pastes; and convenience food, including instant noodles and snacks. The company serves supermarkets, hypermarkets, and convenience stores in Malaysia. It also sells its products through its online platform for its consumer retail market. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
